thread.title: Celebrity chef Paul Prudhomme, portly Cajun who popularized Louisiana cuisine, dies at 75

title: Celebrity chef Paul Prudhomme, portly Cajun who popularized Louisiana cuisine, dies at 75

Celebrity chef Paul Prudhomme, portly Cajun who popularized Louisiana cuisine, dies at 75   3:01   3:01 PM EDT
